Brief Description of sighting: Bright, flashing lights. Moving to the South.
Like a shooting star, but with a burning tail. About the size of a military aircraft. It looked like it was heading towards the ground.
Twelve objects, pulsating coloured lights. The objects split and moved in different directions.
A silver, cigar shaped object. Was moving near a military aircraft. Was stationary at first.
One object that looked a bit like a star at first. It then split into about half a dozen lights, before cloud crossed over them.
Two objects. The first was triangular in shape and had three orange lights. The second was a bright white light.
650-700 objects - appearance of clusters of stars. White and very bright. Arc from horizon to horizon, East to West.
Round silver ball. The object was moving horizontally.
White light flashing. Was a round shape. Was stationary, moved West and then disappeared.
Seven objects flying in arrow formation. They were moving at high speed from South to North.
One object, aircraft type shape. Dark red in colour, quite dim. No sound. Very high up. Moving in fast, small movements.
One object, triangular in shape. Mainly stationary.
Bright lights were seen in the sky. Then followed what looked like people climbing down webbing into the house.
One square shaped object. Orange light in the middle. Was moving from South to the North and then to the West.
A flashing red and blue pulsing light was seen. Then the object glowed orange and started to move towards the ground.
A bright light that was changing shape and moving fast. Was white in colour. Erratic movements.
Single object, bright, white light that appeared to be moving North. The object went very bright like an explosion.
Very large white light, which turned the sky blue.
White flashing ball, with orange trails. Falling.
Seven foot, silver dome, with a blue glow. Was climbing vertically in the sky, in stages.
One round, star shaped object, with one, white flashing light. Very bright. Stationary, but quivering.
Bright, silvery light. Delta shape. Very bright. Stationary, then circling, then moving back and forwards.
Strobe effect lighting. One above the other. The object moved very fast.
An orange object was seen to do circuits around the Liverpool area. There were flames coming out the front with burning bits falling off of it.
An object, was moving slowly from left to right. The object had an orange glow. Had lights on it.
A silver spin top, bobbing at a height of 300 feet. Was about the size of a football.
One object, the size of a pin dot. Bright and shiny.
One object, size of a helicopter. Red and white stripes/lights, with wings like a Phantom. Stationary then darted about the woods.
Object was a tri-angle shape, like an inverted ice cream cone. The object disappeared down a country lane.
Big, bright light in the sky. Was making circular movements and then it hit the ground.
Elliptical and bright like a star. Movement within object. Moving slowly.
Lights in the sky. Like three triangles.
It initially looked like a star. Looked like it was going to crash into the witness's house. Was a green colour, with red on the side.
One object, with a blue glow, which then turned green. It broke up and left smoke. It seemed very large.
Object, burning up in the sky, breaking into two-three pieces, looked like a shooting star, but lower in sky. Turned green.
Orange ball in the sky, looked to be on fire. Was coming from an Easterly direction.
The object looked like a rocket. Had a white/orange glow.
Large blue, fluorescent, cigar shaped object. The object hovered and then moved away quickly.
Bright ball one end, about the size of a tennis ball, which was lit up. Behind it, a long tail tapered off with a smaller ball at the end of the object.
White ball of light. Was moving from West to East. Stopped and then went up into the sky vertically.
One, main object which was very bright. White in colour. Stationary
A huge fireball streaking across the skies of West Yorkshire.
One multi-coloured object. Round at the front and tapered towards the tail. Was moving from left to right.
Three elongated objects. They all had a white light at each end. They hovered and then moved in formation to the North.
One object, shaped like a half circle. There were three lights on it, changing from white to green to red. Whirring sound.
A large orange ball, with a triangle like structure inside it and two white lights at the edge.
One bright object. Looked star shaped. Rose fast in the sky and then disappeared.
One, spherical, with a reddish hue. Very bright and visible the whole time. Zig zagged across the sky, and very fast.
Circle of flashing white light, shaped like a bracelet. Moved over to the right, then left. Lights turned green and red. NW direction.
One object. Point source of light. White in colour. Stationary for about 10 minutes.
Four, round objects with orange lights. Very bright. Were moving from left to right.
Bright orange ball in the sky, which 'hopped', before disappearing.
Very bright, like a shooting star. Tri-angle shaped. Flashing lights - red, purple and green. Moving in a Southerly direction.
Looked like very bright stars. They were still, and then moved from side to side.
Two objects with white lights. The second object seemed dimmer. Moving at 90 degree angles. They moved at high speed.
One object, with red, yellow and green lighting on it. Was flying towards Shrewsbury.
Two lights, that were white and constant. They were heading East.
Two large objects. Very bright and the intensity of Saturn. They were moving from North to South.
Two very bright balls of light. They were moving from the West to East.
One main object, very bright. White in colour. Stationary.
One, large green ball which was shining brightly. Moving straight downwards - would have hit the sea 3-4 miles from the coast.
Two small orange lights, far away in the distance. The lights joined and then look bigger. Looked like two sparklers.
One object, that was white in colour. Slow moving.
Explosion in the sky, but with no sound. It looked like a rocket. Was very large and had a blue and red light.
A white ball, followed by a USAF jet that was contrail ling. Was moving at high speed in a straight line.
A UFO. It had bright red, blue and orange flashing lights, in the shape of a tri-angle. Remained stationary for 15 minutes.
A white, circular object with a ring around it. The object moved ten miles in about 2 seconds, then left to right, and then moved East.
An unconventional silent craft, consisting of four red lights, flying low over the witness's house.
Unusual lights were seen over the bay.
Looked like a bright star. Had a pulsating red and green light. Was stationary and then moved off.
Five flying saucers, that were orange in colour. They moved from East to West and then moved quickly over the sea.
A UFO was running parallel to the landing lanes of an East Midlands Jet. (Message taken 2 March 2001).
Two very bright lights, surrounded by smaller lights.
Soft orange lights in formation. They were moving fast to the South East.
Three small lights above a large star shaped object. Very bright light. Was stationary.
A very, bright light was seen. A couple of hours later, a dark object was seen with lights underneath.
Big bright sphere, looked like Saturn.
Red lights, but could not make out the shape. Hovered for a short time, then headed South East at speed.
Two fuzzy white lights, dancing around each other. They were moving to the East.
Two UFOs with flashing red lights. Objects seemed to interfere with the witness's radio and television, while heading South West.
Fifty five suspicious circles in the sky.
Like a bag with two hanging straps, and one lose hanging strap. It was black and changing shape. Was stationary.
A pair of bright red lights were moving from the South East towards the North West. Each light had a double flashing pulse.
Star like object in the sky. Changing colours - red, blue and green.
Like a spotlight in the sky.
Looked like a star twinkling, but when seen through binoculars, it had a red, orange and blue light.
Three fob shaped objects bobbed about in the sky.
The object was high in the sky and was described as having headlights along the side of it.
One bright light. Was low on the horizon. Was seen for about 20 minutes.
A ball shaped object. It gave off a glow, like a hot coal ember - orange/red. It dropped through the air and then shot up and disappeared.
Big fans of light, which made a circle. There were flashes in the centre of it. Was stationary.
Three very large objects. They were travelling in formation. The distinct formation separated and they headed off South East.
One object, was white and bright. It had a halo above it. Was heading North West.
Large orange, tadpole shaped object with a long tail. Was followed shortly afterwards, by two more similar objects.
Two satellite shaped objects. White and very bright.
One tennis ball sized object. Was round at the front and had a triangular back. Was rainbow coloured and very bright.
Small blobs of rings with a larger ring around them. White and very bright. Stationary.
An alien craft was near to the witness's house. Disc with a beam of light coming from it. Electrical equipment was disturbed.
Bright light travelling across the sky. Was very high and going faster than a jet.
One shooting star, very bright. The movements were slow and then very fast.
A black cylinder. It was moving West and making sharp movements.
Saw an object. It was emitting a bright mauve light.
A large triangular craft hovered over a field. Was very colourful with white and red lights.
Small to medium sized object. Pebble shaped. Was black. Was travelling from South to the North.
A white spherical object. Object was seen for about one minute.
One triangular shaped, pulsing white light. Was about twice the size of a star. Object was stationary.
A hovering, orange light that was low in the sky. It turned white.
Round, red, glowing ball, which changed colour as it slowed down. A second object then appeared.
Sixty - eighty jelly fish shaped objects that were white. There was also one single, pulsating red light amongst them.
One large, disc shaped object. Black in colour. It then changed to oval shape. The object was moving fast to the West.
One object, four times the size of a star. Round in shape. Bright light that was yellow/white. Moved North.
A UFO was floating high up in the sky over Sutton Park.
One dome shaped object. Very dark. Was directly above and moving slowly.
One object. Had a bright light too. Was moving from West to East.
The object was like a star, but was moving.
One object, a circle. Beige in colour. Was flying from North to South West.
One large object, the size of an eagle. It looked like three circles joined together. Was dark brown and black. Quite fast.
One round shaped object. Was silver and reflecting the sun. It was high up and bobbed about.
Eight star sized objects, with lights that were red, white, blue and yellow. Six were following two.
The object was cream coloured. Was travelling at an altitude of about 8,000 feet.
One spherical shaped object. Was orange and yellow. Was stationary for a short amount of time.
A UFO was flying North East.
A sequence of bright lights. Were moving from right to left, then back in a random fashion.
Kite shaped object. Black in colour. Headed West and often changed it's speed.
One, small, balloon shaped object. Brown in colour. Was moving up and down and sideways.
A dark, possibly circular object, as it looked like a rocket at first glance. Part of the object was metallic and glistened.
One circular object with flashing bright lights. Was at a high altitude.
One dome/bell shaped object. It had two red lights either side. Other colours were seen on and off. Stationary.
One circular object, orangey/red. Was very bright. Was moving in a regular figure of eight pattern.
One oval shaped object. It had rotating lights. Was moving to the West.
One, silver, fountain pen shaped object, described as an aircraft without wings.
Two large, shining golf ball like objects. They were moving in and out of the clouds.
One large, circular object and a number of small fragments, size of 10p pieces. White and a glow of red and blue. Very bright.
Strange formation of lights flying overhead.
Big bright, white light. A smaller white light was then moving towards and away from the bigger white light.
Several objects. Different colours - purple, green and white. Very bright. Moving very fast to the South.
Two, 18 inch across, round shaped, spinning objects. White and very bright.
The witness saw something that they could not identify, but it was not a plane.
Two, stationary cone shaped objects. One below each other. They were extremely bright.
Bright round light that moved in steps. It reduced in size, and then when smaller, shot off to the left and disappeared.
One, size unknown. Circular ring, horizontal with tail, hanging below with a black ball at the bottom.
One large, round shaped object. White and very bright. Moved fast upwards in the sky.
The object looked like a circle within a circle.
A red flash fell from the sky. It was falling to the ground in a wide spiral.
One large, square - grid like object. Grey and orange and very bright. Was static and then moved North.
One 15 inch across, circular shaped object. Metallic grey. The witness got up close and touched it.
Four cone shaped objects, which were brightly lit. They were in a line, and moving North East.
In between two to three stars, there was a something/star which exploded in to a large mass.
Eight to nine smokeless flares. Two were falling - parallel.
Circular object with a depression in the middle. Was a grey/metallic colour. Very bright. It was emitting smoke.
One large, white, circular light, moving at high speed with no sound, at about 500 feet.
One object that looked a bit like an inverted U. Moving due West.
One rectangular/triangle shaped object. It had a white light that was pulsating. Was of average brightness. Moving North East.
A twinkling object in the air, in close proximity to a plane.
Red ball of fire. It was low on the horizon and was moving to the East.
The object was very large and about the size of a helicopter, which made no sound. Two consecutive nights
The object was very large and about the size of a helicopter, which made no sound. Two consecutive nights
A very large, round object, followed by another object, which was green and conical in shape. Both were travelling fast.
One white/very bright object. Moving vertically, then remained stationary, with occasional bursts of light. Seen for over an hour.
One mushroom/lampshade shaped object, about six-eight feet. Was white with a very bright base. Very fast.
There was a light through the witness's window, which seemed to be quite a distance away, and moving slowly.
The ship/craft moved towards Ashford and then hovered over Ashford for some time. The craft was solid.
One triangular shaped object. The size of a 747, maybe bigger. It moved N-Easterly, then became stationary.
Exactly fifty objects, that looked like points of light. Very bright. They were in line formation, and moving from East to West.
A spaceship was seen that had lights on the top and bottom of it.
Mentioned that the planets are in danger from different things going on in our solar system.
The object was larger than Venus but smaller than the moon. Was very white. Was wiggling from side to side.
A silent helicopter (resembling a sea stallion), shone a light on the witness. There was a low humming noise.
Bright white light with an orange light at the rear.
Well defined blue object, which was fat at both ends, but slim in the middle.
A vast number of lights flashing in the sky. The lights then became still.
Three to four objects that were smaller than a large aircraft. Were triangular in shape, white and very bright.
The object looked like half of a saucer, had red and green lights, but mostly white. Also appeared to have rings round it.
One triangular object with lights.
One red object sighted by the Captain in flight.
Tennis ball size and shape, with an orange centre and a black inner line around the circle. Two bright green flare trails from the rear.
Small star shaped object.
One large torpedo shaped object with red and white lights. There were bright lights at the front, and also amber flashing lights.
One roundish shaped object that was glowing white and red.
One silver object, long cylinder hanging from a parachute or balloon, drifting SE. It was very big and very high.
Strange lights in the sky, moving very erratically - quick dart like movements - moves then stops before moving off again.
One object the size of a small room. Was spinning on it's own axis.
An assortment of flashing lights.
Triangular shaped object that was multi coloured and had lights on the sides and points of the shape.
Three lights together, that looked like an elongated triangle. The lights were very bright.
Two grey plumes of smoke in the sky over Stockport Railway Station. A grey triangle was then witnessed.
Red light moving fast, high up in the sky. It slowed down, got fast again and then wobbled from side to side.
The object looked like a rounded triangle, longer at one point, with a giant light in the centre.
Unusual aerial phenomenon.
Two round, thirty foot objects. Each had one white light on the left, and one red light on the right. Was a low rumbling sound.
Looked like a bright orange tear drop shaped object, that appeared to have lightning coming from its sides.
A bright light that was covered in black spots.
One opal shaped object with lights, that were orange, red, blue and white. Was very bright.
Object was travelling from East to West.
One object, the shape of a star. Triangular red lights. There were also yellow and blue rays. Was hovering. Pulsated and then vanished.
A bright, green light was moving at very high speed. The object appeared to land near Kegworth over the M1
Silver ball, really bright. Was lower than an aircraft and moving in a straight line. (Message taken 17 Feb 2001).
